name: American Hotel Income Properties REIT LP 6.00% Convertible Unsecured Subordinated Debentures
longDescription: American Hotel Income Properties REIT LP is a trust that invests in hotel real estate properties. The company's primary business is owning Premium Branded hotels, which have franchise agreements with international hotel brands including Marriott, Hilton, and IHG. It generates revenue from the room, food, beverage, and other revenue. The other revenue is comprised of conference room rentals, parking revenues, and other incidental income.

fullAddress: 810 - 925 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, CA
